PaymentInitiationSource.name: PaymentInitiationSource
PaymentInitiationSource.description: Represents the originating source of a payment. This information helps other Salesforce products integrate with Salesforce Payments. This object is available in API version 63.0 and later.

AccountId.description: The account record that initiated this payment.

Channel.description: The origin of the submitted payment. For example, D2C, virtual terminal, or merchant MOTO (mail order or phone order).

CollectionPlanId.description: The collection plan record that submitted payment. This field is available only for merchant-initiated payment collections. For example, a merchant collects an outstanding balance using a Pay Now payment link or over the phone.

ContactId.description: The contact record of the contact that made the payment.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for organizations with the multicurrency feature enabled. This field contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, it’s possible that the user only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed it.

Name.description: Name of the payment initiation source record. For example, d9e01178-b6878-2f4b-a14d-b0132b7ret67

OpportunityId.description: The opportunity record that made the payment.

OrderSummaryId.description: The order summary record that initiated the payment. This field is available with Salesforce Order Management and Commerce applications.

PaymentScheduleItemId.description: The payment schedule item record that initiated the payment. This field is available only with the Scheduler application.

Process.description: Component within the application that’s initiating the payment. Maximum length of the string is 255 characters. For example, managed or custom checkout, product description page (PDP).

QuoteId.description: The quote record that initiated the payment.

ServiceAppointmentId.description: The service appointment record that initiated the payment. This field is available only with the Field Service application.

SiteId.description: The site record that initiated the payment. This field is for applications that don't have a web store, but created a digital experience site to accept payments

WebCartId.description: The web cart record that submitted the payment.

WebStoreId.description: The web store record that initiated the payment. For example, a B2B, D2C, or Pay Now store.

WorkOrderId.description: The work order record that submitted the payment. This field is available only for the Field Service application.

WorkOrderLineItemId.description: The work order line item record that made the payment. This field is only available with the Field Service application.
